analysis.summary: Document management trigger analysis for termination event with conflicting actions between return_all_information requirement and potential destruction protocols for confidential materials
insights: Termination is listed as a valid trigger event for document management workflow
Return_all_information action specified with 5-day timeline requirement
Document classified as confidential which may have special handling requirements
No destroy action explicitly mentioned in the provided trigger data
Chain of custody documentation will be required for legal compliance
recommendations: Verify termination trigger through HR or management confirmation before initiating any document actions
Prioritize return_all_information action as it is explicitly specified in the requirements
Generate certification of return documentation for all confidential materials within 5-day timeline
Maintain detailed chain of custody log including timestamps, handlers, and transfer methods
Consult legal department for specific confidential document handling protocols during termination
Ensure secure transfer method appropriate for confidential classification level
